p: The aerial parts of Euphorbia balsamifera Aiton were collected from Asir region in the road of Khamis-Najran, Saudi Arabia, in February 2018 (GPS: 18 04 47.3Â N, 43 14 24.9E). The plant was identified by Dr. Mahmoud Fawzy, biology department, college of science, King Khalid University. A voucher specimen of the plant was identified and authenticated in the Herbarium of Botany department, college of science, King Khalid University.
